ygData.subject: Re: Wooden Totem
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes this can only be used by wisdom casters and I ve seen them sell for around 3pp. ... From: Gregory Egan  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Yes this can only be used by wisdom casters and I've seen them sell for
around 3pp.
-----Original Message-----
From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 29, 1999 10:30 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Wooden Totem


>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>Sorry if this is a litte off subject, but I got a wooden totem off a gnoll
>shaman, says +5 mana, but only CLR DRU BRD SHM can use it. Anyone know what
>it's for, and if I auction it how much is it worth?
>Thanks.
>
>Greg (Kronan)
>

>ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
